New Records: Jayson Tatum scored 26 points in the first half, establishing a 22-point lead for the Celtics, who achieved their first 30-point victory of the season
Key Match Events: Jayson Tatum's aggressive start with 16 first-quarter points, his 4-of-6 three-point shooting, and his role as a facilitator in the second half leading to a 37-point lead
Pre-Game Insights: Jayson Tatum aimed to start the game more aggressively compared to previous seasons, which he achieved with a strong first quarter
Post-Match Reflections: Jayson Tatum and Derrick White discussed their headband tradition, and the Celtics reflected on their dominant performance and strategy adjustments
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Celtics' no-sweat win and the headband tradition between Jayson Tatum and Derrick White
